MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD9 postcode area of Hawick. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.46pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further repairs required to a grounded cable near Brothwick Brae and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:38PM on Wednesday 03 February 2021.
